author: felicity
msg: add a test for bug 2292, parsing from addresses out of the comment section of the From header...

author: felicity
msg: bug 2292: whitelist_from would have issues when the From header had a comment with an email address in it which was whitelisted.  changed to using the get('...:addr') code instead which knows how to ignore comments and the like.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3304: turns out that if you set a constant to qr/.../, you need to do =~CONSTANT, not =~/CONSTANT/ ...

author: felicity
msg: bug 3290: whitelist_addrs.t was failing because we ignore squirrelmail headers in 3.0.  changed the IP in the received header prior to the squirrelmail header to match the t/data/nice/002 mail so the test succeeds.  the other tests didn't break when doing this, so ... :)

author: quinlan
msg: BondedSender data in SenderBase appears to be stale or incomplete
